description:
You are given 'n' number of balls and all the balls are either green white or saffron. Arrange the balls such that it resembles the Indian Flag (Saffron followed by white followed by Green).

#### Sample Input:
```
G S S W S G W S
```
#### Sample Output:
```
S S S S W W G G
```
#### Constraints:

- `3<=n<=10^6`
title: Arrange the balls

default_testcase.input:
9
S S G G W W W W W
default_testcase.expected_output: S S W W W W W G G
